values: Sustained by Sovereign Grace: The Ground of AssuranceSustained by Sovereign Grace: The Ground of Assurance

Sovereign, sustaining grace, purchased at the cross, is what orders all our trouble and pain and is the only way we will continue in the faith until the end.Sovereign, sustaining grace, purchased at the cross, is what orders all our trouble and pain and is the only way we will continue in the faith until the end.
